name: Sniper Ops Gun: Terrorist Atta
description:
is an epic FPS shooting game. In this war, terrorists lurk in a war-torn city. The brave commando has accepted the difficult mission of going to the city to destroy the terrorists. This mission is very challenging, in the battlefield in the face of brutal enemies, to protect themselves and destroy the enemy.

Features:
- HD 3D graphics
- Realistic 3D shooting battlefield environment
- Simple and smooth operation
- a large number of advanced powerful weapons
- Radar vision positioning the enemy's position
- Challenges of increasing levels of difficulty
